A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A sometimes-dazzling romp and many nuanced surprises that will stick in your mind after the shiny stuff has gone. It meets your expectations while setting up a long story to come. Don't much care for the new ancillary characters (except DJ - Benicio is brilliant) but the chemistry between Kylo and Rey is delicious. Funnily enough\, Kylo is  the more layered & dimensional of the two\, but Rey is what she needs to be... And she is compelling. You need a deeper approach to truly appreciate this installment.
